array.string: <b:t>A shortbread recipe has a ratio of</b:t> <b:ot tag="a">3</b:ot> <b:t>: </b:t> <b:ot tag="b">2</b:ot> <b:t>:</b:t> <b:ot tag="c">1</b:ot> <b:t> of</b:t> <b:ot tag="d">flour</b:ot> <b:t>, butter and</b:t> <b:ot tag="f">sugar.</b:ot> <b:t>There is only</b:t> <b:ot tag="g">60g of butter,</b:ot> <b:t> how much sugar and flour will be needed?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="f" enabled="no">60g </b:ot> <b:op op="รท" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="b" enabled="no">2</b:ot> <b:op op="=" /> <b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="30">30</b:ot> <b:t>g sugar</b:t>
<b:ot tag="f" enabled="no">60g</b:ot> <b:op op="x" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">3/2</b:ot> <b:op op="=" /> <b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="90">90</b:ot> <b:t>g flour</b:t>
